short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a online gallery tool that automatically combines many photos into a nicely arranged single panel of photos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Select photos on your computer to process into a combined image. Don't upload Any Big sized photos if your computer is too old to deal with it.

2. Choose options you want.

3. Click the `Combine Photos` Button to start processing. When you see a processed image, save the image with `Save As...` option by clicking right button of your mouse over the image.
